# How to Run App
`Require Net 6`
1. Install .Net sdk 6.100 https://dotnet.microsoft.com/en-us/download/dotnet/6.0
2. Open in visual studio

## Payload
`Change Token with your idToken or rawIdToken from azure AD`

``` bash
curl --location --request POST 'https://localhost:7058/Auth/Verify' \
--header 'authority: localhost:7058' \
--data-raw '{
    "Token": "eyJ0eXAiOiJKV1QiLCJhbGciOiJSUzI1NiIsImtpZCI6ImpTMVhvMU9XRGpfNTJ2YndHTmd2UU8yVnpNYyJ9..R2KsmRzS2cmF29acvd3UAPcurE1Rtnxksgm3qcBP8fHLb1jJy292_TgZolRy3fTVmqEI3NvQulccLyN0gph9GnzH-4_6HDFfpPccFFuzBITaXy1mEJYKl6gJNcYRrYg9fL8blB5ItHY907laRnUCjmAdTbUD9KLpJQhUqCzgtELmVRleMOlRas5zblQQv3hUGebvdBT71VxtunUFp3k4zJTT9KbIsYd4vKeQr0GDgmlOvHfnn41mOY7E-Bb3CxndI13BexBImHdbsQoluEVoABPoYzI6T2a1kWK25p5Q-jXfczZ2BH-3l6javQriWUMJy3TcHhO4uhtf9blZiha0LQ"
}'
```
## Example idToken
`below Token should be expired`

```
eyJ0eXAiOiJKV1QiLCJhbGciOiJSUzI1NiIsImtpZCI6ImpTMVhvMU9XRGpfNTJ2YndHTmd2UU8yVnpNYyJ9..R2KsmRzS2cmF29acvd3UAPcurE1Rtnxksgm3qcBP8fHLb1jJy292_TgZolRy3fTVmqEI3NvQulccLyN0gph9GnzH-4_6HDFfpPccFFuzBITaXy1mEJYKl6gJNcYRrYg9fL8blB5ItHY907laRnUCjmAdTbUD9KLpJQhUqCzgtELmVRleMOlRas5zblQQv3hUGebvdBT71VxtunUFp3k4zJTT9KbIsYd4vKeQr0GDgmlOvHfnn41mOY7E-Bb3CxndI13BexBImHdbsQoluEVoABPoYzI6T2a1kWK25p5Q-jXfczZ2BH-3l6javQriWUMJy3TcHhO4uhtf9blZiha0LQ
```
